course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Creating Value Through Effective Negotiations
course.description: This course aims to make students more effective negotiators by developing business acumen, building leadership & teamworking skills, strengthening communication, and improving critical decision making. The course will emphasise the importance of (a) balancing interests to ensure negotiations aren't one-sided, (b) exploring options for maximising value creation, (c) strengthening alternatives to improve negotiating position, (d) building legitimacy to enhance negotiation credibility, (e) developing strong relationships to facilitate interactions with others. The role of ethics and decision making in negotiations will also be covered.  The course is example rich, taught from a practitioner's perspective and is especially designed for MBA students.
